title: 20: No Such Thing As A Dangerous Daffodil
content: This week in the QI office Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Anne (@miller_anne) and Andy (@andrewhunterm) discuss aggressive bees, Walt Disney's breakfast, shouting on buses and more...
